message_1: In a substitution cipher, the letter "A" is encrypted as "D", the letter "B" is encrypted as "E", the letter "C" is encrypted as "F", and so on until the letter "Z" is encrypted as "C". If the message "MEET AT NOON" is encrypted using this cipher, what is the encrypted message?
